column5: Is there anyone has same problem like me? I found myself to be disabled from posting new topic or reply at Classifieds sub-forum. It said "You cannot start a new topic" at the right corner of the webpage. So just wondering if there is any requirement to the users for posting new topic or reply on "Classifieds". For the other sub-forum everything is perfect.  Sorry everyone but I don't know where I should talk to so just post my question here.  Thanks.

You could try PM'ing a Mod.  To answer your question there is a minimum post requirement before members can use the classifieds, you're almost there.  Helps cut down on the frequent abuse and spamming of the classifieds.
Thanks admin  I'm new to OFC forum but I love this place
you may have hit the magic number so have a look...
